Include #include "NiagaraDataInterface.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (Abstract, EditInlineNew, MinimalAPI)  
class UNiagaraDataInterface : public UNiagaraDataInterfaceBase

Remarks

Base class for all Niagara data interfaces.
